728648f-b.text:
(1)
976 Castleton Avenue, at the S.W. corner of North Burgher Avenue. The house belonged to the A.W. Sexton Estate, according to Robinsons 1898 map, and to Harriett M. Sullivan, according to
Bromley'e 1907 map. TThe view is eastward.
April 22, 1930.
P.L. Snerr
(2)
Another view, looking westward.
February 5, 1930.
P.L. Sperr
(1)
An additional view, looking northward along the west side of North Burgher Avenue. In the background appears the
Toman Catholic Church of the Sacred Heart.
Pebruary 5, 1930.
P.L. Sperr
